title.rendered: Salt Spring Air in British Columbia, Canada

content.rendered:
Salt Spring Air (also known as Saltspring Air) part of Harbour Air Seaplanes, is a floatplane company based on Saltspring Island, British Columbia, Canada. It was established on 2003.

 

 

Salt Spring Air in British Columbia, Canada Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

central office Address: 3102 – 115 Fulford Ganges Road
Salt Spring Island, BC, Canada

Phone: 250.537.9880
Reservations Contact Center: 1.800.665.0212

Lower Mainland 604.274.1277
Victoria 250.384.2215
Nanaimo 250.714.0900
Salt Spring Island 250.537.9880
Sunshine Coast 604.885.2111
Whistler 604.932.6615
Toll Free in North America 1.800.665.0212

Hours of Operation: 7:00 am to 7:00 pm daily
(Pacific Standard Time)

Downtown Vancouver: Monday to Sunday: 7:00 am to 7:00 pm

Richmond (YVR South): Monday to Sunday: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm

Victoria Harbour: 7:00 am to 6:30 pm daily

Nanaimo Harbour: 7:00 am to 6:30 pm daily

Salt Spring Island (Ganges): Monday to Friday: 6:45 am to 6:30 pm
Saturday & Sunday: 7:00 am to 6:30 pm

Sechelt: 8:00 am to 6:00 pm daily

Comox: Monday to Friday: 7:30 am to 10:30 am & 3:30 pm to 6:30 pm
Saturday & Sunday: 8:30 am to 11:30 am & 3:30 pm to 6:30 pm

Whistler (Green Lake): Monday to Thursday: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm
Friday to Sunday (& holidays): 8:00 am to 6:00 pm

Email: NA

Salt Spring Air Official website: https://www.harbourair.com/

Check Salt Spring Air schedule here: https://www.harbourair.com/flight-info/flight/schedules/

Check Salt Spring Air flight status here: https://www.harbourair.com/flight-info/flight/flight-status/

Salt Spring Air Baggage

View Salt Spring Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Salt Spring Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Salt Spring Air in British Columbia, Canada Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Salt Spring Air in British Columbia, Canada: (click on the stars below)
